Foxfingers still has his comm programed for Maximal

Foxfingers listens curiously as the call to report to the CF comes through.
"Veratis, I know you're busy but I thought you might want to hear this." He
replays the message for the four bots in the classroom, "Give you any
ideas?"

Veratis stretches his back, slightly extending his bat wings. "I think we
should be included in this meeting, it'll give us the chance to get more
aquainted with our new associates." He tries not to think to heavily on the
subject knowing that strong emotions could be read by Ice. "I think it's
time to give you a field test." He looks over the three in the classroom
surveying his possabilities. "Ice, I'm putting you in charge, don't tell
them who you were or where you came from, I still don't fully trust anyone
with my technology."

Lunarpine stood up as if to voice his objections when Veratis cut him off in
mid thought, "Ice can pick things up in thier minds before they can react to
it." Still seeing the need to justify his decision he continues "Her
telepathy can relay orders faster than either of you can call them out, and
She will be able to cover your backs more efficiently than you."

Lunarpine didn't have to say a word, he knew that Veratis didn't mean
"could" The old science bot was right when he assumed that Lunarpine might
hesitate to cover Razor Claw. That one revelation put the choice into a new
light. The wolf knew that Veratis had made the only logical decision.

Razor Claw stood and faced the old bot, "What is  my role in this mission?"
He had no knowlege of the Maximal units so he didn't know what he could
offer the team.

"You have the strength they might need if they get into a messy situation."
He checked what limited information he had on the new member of the team,
"I'm placing you as Ice's bodygaurd, your shield can protect her if there's
trouble.:" He again checked his notes, "You will all de given a  DNA
recorder. Any bot you will come in contact with will be sent back to me.
I've set the devices on a changing frequency to make it harder to trace." he
looked to Ice again, "Try to protect my prototype, I'd like her returned in
one piece."
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>

Subject: (ALL MAXIMALS READ) Re: Why attack? / Maximal Meeting


> Scrap Prowl's last post, this has what it had (slightly modified).
>
> ::Kluster/Prowl::
>
> kluster frowns, looking around. This was pissing him off. Activating
> the comm, one more time, he sends a transmission to ALL MAXIMALS.
>
> "All Maximals, this is the third call to the meeting at the
> Cybertronian Fire. Get to the conference room immediately."
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Prowl glances at Iron Raptor as he hears her thoughts. He didn't mean
> to imply that she was weak by protecting her.
>
> -I didn't say you were weak, love- he replies through thought,
> looking over at her as she stepped up. His eyes slid over her form,
> her curves showing through nicely. Prowl jerks his eyes back to
> shadown, but then frowns as he hears Iron Raptor's thoughts. The
> mixed beast mode wasn't gone?
>
> Iris had said that the merge would take care of the problem. But what
> if it hadn't? What if Iron Raptor could still get stuck in that form?
> Prowl shakes his head. It wasn't very likely. It was only a thought,
> after all.
>
> He looks back at Iron Raptor as she yells the command, watching her
> go into the 'battle mode', or at least that's what he thought it was.
> He smiles as he looks her over. Her curves still showed through. She
> looked like a warrior now that she stood as tall as Prowl, but she
> was still definetly feminine. Prowl smiles. He wouldn't mind finding
> out how it felt to kiss her in that mode...
>
> Kluster's transmission sounds in Prowl's head, distracting him from
> Iron Raptor's words to Shadow. This mode obvioustly had a comm-link.
>
> -Kluster's calling all Maximals to a meeting, love- he says to her
> using his thoughts -We should get over to the Cybertronian Fire-
>
>
>
>
